name: Hoodwink
title: Forest Rogue
lore: Hoodwink grew up in the forest, learning to fight with cunning and trickery against much larger foes.

acornShot.name: Acorn Shot
acornShot.description: Fires an acorn that bounces between enemies, slowing them. Plants a tree if it hits the ground.

bushwhack.name: Bushwhack
bushwhack.description: Throws a net that stuns enemies if they're near a tree.

scurry.name: Scurry
scurry.description: Hoodwink has a chance to evade attacks. Gains bonus movement speed near trees.

sharpshooter.name: Sharpshooter
sharpshooter.description: Charges up and fires a powerful bolt that deals massive damage based on charge time.
